trans-unit.source: Recommendations
trans-unit.target: Recommendations

trans-unit.source: Use instructional UI to introduce a new user to what your app can do.
trans-unit.target: Use instructional UI to introduce a new user to what your app can do.

trans-unit.source: Use for tips on new features or specific details about how your app has changed after an update.
trans-unit.target: Use for tips on new features or specific details about how your app has changed after an update.

trans-unit.source: Integrate instructional UI with specific tasks.
trans-unit.target: Integrate instructional UI with specific tasks.

trans-unit.source: Don't block interaction with the application UI.
trans-unit.target: Don't block interaction with the application UI.

trans-unit.source: Additional usage guidance
trans-unit.target: Additional usage guidance

trans-unit.source: In some circumstances, the best way to help users interact with your app is to teach them from within your app's UI.
trans-unit.target: In some circumstances, the best way to help users interact with your app is to teach them from within your app's UI.

trans-unit.source: We use the term *instructional UI* to refer to this type of guidance.
trans-unit.target: We use the term *instructional UI* to refer to this type of guidance.

trans-unit.source: A great example is using a UI element, like inline text or a flyout, to tell a user when they need to use a touch interaction to complete a task.
trans-unit.target: A great example is using a UI element, like inline text or a flyout, to tell a user when they need to use a touch interaction to complete a task.

trans-unit.source: Keep in mind that instructional UI is not a replacement for thoughtful design.
trans-unit.target: Keep in mind that instructional UI is not a replacement for thoughtful design.

trans-unit.source: If you use it too often or out of context, you can disrupt the flow of your app and diminish its effectiveness.
trans-unit.target: If you use it too often or out of context, you can disrupt the flow of your app and diminish its effectiveness.

trans-unit.source: Before adding instructional UI, explore other ways to introduce users to your app.
trans-unit.target: Before adding instructional UI, explore other ways to introduce users to your app.

trans-unit.source: See Related Topics for more info about layouts, navigation, and controls.
trans-unit.target: See Related Topics for more info about layouts, navigation, and controls.

trans-unit.source: Principles of instructional UI design
trans-unit.target: Principles of instructional UI design

trans-unit.source: Keep it simple.
trans-unit.target: Keep it simple.

trans-unit.source: Introduce one basic concept at a time and use images when possible.
trans-unit.target: Introduce one basic concept at a time and use images when possible.

trans-unit.source: Consider adding a Help section to your UWP app to address complex features.
trans-unit.target: Consider adding a Help section to your UWP app to address complex features.

trans-unit.source: Teach in context.
trans-unit.target: Teach in context.

trans-unit.source: Integrate instructional UI with the task it helps a user complete.
trans-unit.target: Integrate instructional UI with the task it helps a user complete.

trans-unit.source: A user is more likely to retain a concept when it's introduced when they need it most.
trans-unit.target: A user is more likely to retain a concept when it's introduced when they need it most.

trans-unit.source: Don't block interaction.
trans-unit.target: Don't block interaction.

trans-unit.source: Make sure users can still interact with your app while instructional UI is present.
trans-unit.target: Make sure users can still interact with your app while instructional UI is present.

trans-unit.source: Instructional UI should help users, not annoy them by getting in the way.
trans-unit.target: Instructional UI should help users, not annoy them by getting in the way.

trans-unit.source: Teach, then disappear.
trans-unit.target: Teach, then disappear.

trans-unit.source: Remove instructional UI as soon as it's no longer relevant or allow the user to dismiss it.
trans-unit.target: Remove instructional UI as soon as it's no longer relevant or allow the user to dismiss it.

trans-unit.source: Also, in most cases, users only need instructional UI displayed once.
trans-unit.target: Also, in most cases, users only need instructional UI displayed once.

trans-unit.source: Avoid repeatedly displaying the same instructional UI.
trans-unit.target: Avoid repeatedly displaying the same instructional UI.

trans-unit.source: Use sparingly.
trans-unit.target: Use sparingly.

trans-unit.source: Thoughtful design and a Help section can often teach users everything they need to know to enjoy your app.
trans-unit.target: Thoughtful design and a Help section can often teach users everything they need to know to enjoy your app.

trans-unit.source: Consider the breadth of design options before adding instructional UI to your app.
trans-unit.target: Consider the breadth of design options before adding instructional UI to your app.
